It is characterized by its compact growth habit and distinctive, lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. The plant produces small, clustered inflorescences with pale green to white flowers, which bloom in late spring. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its native range.
